title: So why don't they omit yuumi Q next patch
body:
Instead of nerfing it lets be honest 40% to 60% slow into a 20% flat slow. Plus slow duration is reduced to 1 second why not just accept it and practically remove it at his point since that's what you (the balance team) want. It's not bad enough she's basically a item now they are deleting her only ability that helps. All she is good at is afk in teammates and don't bother wasting mana on ultimate costing Q ability.  The Main reason why I buy ludens on her it's the dmg buff she deserves but after these nerfs. I only will play yuumi adc is the most logical route instead of being a heal slave.

But wait the top tier champions got buffed despite already burst nature. I'm guessing Yasuo is getting buffed the patch after that.

replies.body:
Haven't you seen yuumi performance in pro play? In that case if you only see her soloq performance I get your confusion. 

Obviously riot don't want every worlds red side team to waste a ban on her.

So I was right and the mass is wrong they all said yuumi isn't pro play material?  After all that time I proved them wrong wow.  I told them the masses were wrong why didn't no one listen how yuumi is made specifically for pro play no more or less.

Sorry if I'm ranty but I play yuumi a lot.  Idk why the most powerful champs are getting buffs while the "funish" champs get nerfed.

> So I was right and the mass is wrong they all said yuumi isn't pro play material? After all that time I proved them wrong wow. I told them the masses were wrong why didn't no one listen how yuumi is made specifically for pro play no more or less.

Who are the "masses"? We have known this since release.
there are people who told me how yuumi wasnt gonna hit pro play due to her being too ez and low impact and i was like no she is made for pro play mainly.
